hotspots.marketing_summary: Command attention with the ELANTRA's bold front grille, seamlessly integrated into the headlight architecture for a confident look.
Illuminate the road ahead with available LED headlights, providing superior visibility and a modern aesthetic.
Enhance your ELANTRA's sporty profile with available 18-inch alloy wheels, designed for both style and performance.
Experience seamless control with the available 10.25" touch-screen display, your command center for entertainment and information.
Immerse yourself in a world of sound with the available Bose® Premium Audio system, delivering an unparalleled listening experience.
Sink into the exclusive N Line sport seats, embossed with the 'N' logo and featuring red contrast stitching, for a sporty and luxurious feel.
Enjoy a more dynamic drive with the N Line's sport-tuned suspension and steering, making cornering a true pleasure.
Keep your devices powered up effortlessly with the available wireless charging pad, a convenient and modern touch.
